title: DockTop
description: DockTop is a modern, feature-rich terminal user interface for managing Docker containers. Built with Rust and Ratatui, it provides real-time monitoring, interactive wizards, and a beautiful interface.

title: StreetAI
description: AI-Powered Interactive Maps combining geolocation with AI-generated insights. Users can select a location on the map, and AI will provide detailed explanations.

title: Coralwind
description: Comprehensive hotel booking web application created for UPK. Features room management, booking flows, and specific administration panels.

title: Mellow Movie TMDb
description: Frontend module for Sekawan Media training. A dynamic movie wiki consuming the TMDb API to display movie details and information.

title: FastUnduh
description: High-performance universal video downloader built with Go (Fiber), Vue 3, and Redis. Features asynchronous job queues, smart polling, and TTL storage architecture.

title: Replas Banksampah
description: Waste bank management system. (Description auto-fetched from repository).

title: Toko Thrift Laravel
description: Final project for Sekawan Media Fullstack Laravel module, enhanced with Next.js features.
